column4: by looking at the torrents you can tell that most people are still using i386 architecture (i386=167) (amd64=14)
that will probably change over the next year since most new systems are already amd64
eg all celeron 3x1 p4 5x1 6xx 8xx and athlon64
i am running it now and it rocks
x86_64 is generic and amd64-k8 may have processor optimizations (most likely)(
